content.question: In the key of G major, what is the correct Roman numeral analysis?

choices.label: Ⅰ Ⅴ43 Ⅰ6 Ⅴ65 Ⅰ Ⅴ43 Ⅰ6
Ⅰ ⅱ ⅲ ⅶo Ⅰ ⅱ ⅲ
Ⅰ Ⅴ64 ⅲ ⅶo Ⅰ Ⅴ64 Ⅰ6
Ⅰ Ⅴ64 Ⅰ6 Ⅴ65 Ⅰ Ⅴ43 Ⅰ6

content.answer: Ⅰ Ⅴ43 Ⅰ6 Ⅴ65 Ⅰ Ⅴ43 Ⅰ6

unit.text: 3: Music Fundamentals III - Triads and Seventh Chords

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Use symbols and terms to describe melodic, harmonic, and rhythmic relationships in notated music. (This skill is applied in describing these elements in a full musical context.)
